text: xo phraphupenceakhxng phwk rea! Pord xya hı hawcı khxng phwk rea xenxeiyng xxk cak khwam cring ley hlangcak thi phraxngkh di thrng næana kæ phwk rea læw læa pord di prathan khwam xendu metta cak thi thi phraxngkh hı kæ phwk rea dwy theid thæcring phraxngkh nan khux phuthrng prathan hı xyang makmay
